name: 甜蜜狂潮Honey Fury
description:
Base Construction and Strategic Card Management. You will construct and defend your base from enemy invasions. Employ clever layouts to enhance your base's defenses and acquire resources through card management. Get ready to embrace this strategic and thrilling honey-fueled frenzy!


The operation of most buildings rely on worker huts.
In addition, various BUFF buildings can provide powerful buffs for defensive towers.
Layout smartly, maximize the utilization of worker huts and BUFF buildings, and create an indestructible base!



Only by holding on to 30 waves of enemy attacks can you win the game.
The number of enemies will be increasing, and the attacks of the 5th, 10th, 15th, 20th, 25th, and 30th waves are even more fierce!
Get ready for this battle!


Character development & building blueprints
Complete the levels and get a lot of honey immediately; light placement gameplay is also available!
Upgrade your character's attributes and enhance your technology with a variety of ways to play!



Only by holding on to the 30 waves of enemy attacks will you be able to achieve the final victory of the game.
The number of enemies will intensify, and the 5th, 10th, 15th, 20th, 25th, and 30th waves will be even more ferocious!
Get ready for the battle!



Different maps have different characteristics and special items
Each map has hidden special items for you to explore


Each card gives you corresponding resources of the same texture every ten seconds.
After you successfully resist the enemy's attack, multiple cards will be drawn according to your resource building.
Pay attention to card type management. Three cards in a row will trigger a straight, bringing twice the output;
And Triplet brings three times the output! Play your mahjong talent and win more resources!
